description: Numbers that are palindromic in base 14.
links: P. De Geest, Palindromic numbers beyond base 10
mathematica: f[n_,b_]:=Module[{i=IntegerDigits[n,b]},i==Reverse[i]];lst={};Do[If[f[n,14],AppendTo[lst,n]],{n,7!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 08 2009 *)pal14Q[n_]:=Module[{idn14=IntegerDigits[n,14]},idn14==Reverse[idn14]]; Select[ Range[0,600],pal14Q] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 03 2014 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
